sentences.en: Arthritis and rheumatism are prominent crippling diseases.
sentences.cn: 关节炎和风湿病是会严重损害身体健康的主要疾病。

sentences.en: Arthritis is a crippling disease which affects people all over the world.
sentences.cn: 关节炎是一种会危害全人类健康的致残性疾病。

sentences.en: As a result Heath rarely exhibited Nixon's crippling diffidence.
sentences.cn: 因此,希思很少表现出尼克松那种郁郁寡欢.

sentences.en: Beyond the human cost, the crime rate is crippling black enterprise.
sentences.cn: 除了生命的损失之外, 犯罪率高也使黑人企业陷于瘫痪.

sentences.en: But most crippling were the communication failures.
sentences.cn: 不过,最关键的问题还是通讯故障.

sentences.en: Criminal charges against a firm are potentially crippling and are extremely rare.
sentences.cn: 对一家公司提起刑事指控,可能影响巨大,因此极其罕见.

sentences.en: He was burdened with crippling debts.
He was stricken at twenty-one with a crippling malady.
Improved how the manacost scales on Crippling Fear.
sentences.cn: 修正了暗夜魔王禁魔的魔耗.

sentences.en: It's certainly a crippling handicap taken on too early.
sentences.cn: 它当然是一场夭折的障碍赛,进展得太快了.

sentences.en: Nightstalker's Crippling Fear now has a minor effect during the day.
sentences.cn: 夜魔的伤寒恐惧在白天也会有较小的效果.

sentences.en: Remarkably, the child recovered from a disease which had swept the world, killing and crippling millions.
sentences.cn: 令人意想不到的是，这个孩子从病中康复了，而这种病症曾经席卷整个世界，使数以百万计的人丧生或残疾。

sentences.en: The 14 - inch torpedo has no hope of crippling a modern dreadnought.
sentences.cn: 355毫米鱼雷不能重创一艘先进的无畏战舰.

sentences.en: the crippling effects of war on the economy
sentences.cn: 战争给经济造成的毁灭性影响

sentences.en: The strong yen is crippling exports.
sentences.cn: 日元的坚挺使出口陷于瘫痪.

sentences.en: They both suffered from crippling pains in their hips.
sentences.cn: 他们俩都感到髋部疼痛难忍。

words.tran_cn: 使成跛子；使受伤致残（cripple的过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 严重损害身体的，有严重后果的
trans.tran_en: causing so much damage or harm that something no longer works or is no longer effective

trans.tran_cn: 削弱“cripple”的现在分词，使受损
